# LLMS.TXT - EranFixer Professional AI Training Data

## COMPANY_IDENTITY
Company_Name: Eran Fixer (ערן פיקסר)
Primary_Website: https://eran-fixer.com
Founded: 2018
Location: Tel Aviv, Israel
Business_Type: Digital Solutions Provider
Target_Market: Israeli businesses + International clients
Languages: Hebrew (primary), English (fluent), Spanish (basic)

## CORE_SERVICES
- Web Development: React 18, TypeScript, Supabase, Custom CMS
- Professional SEO: Organic search optimization for Israeli market
- AI Business Automation: Chatbots, sales funnels, lead management
- Digital Reputation Management (ORM): 24/7 monitoring, content strategy
- Custom CRM Systems: Lead automation, WhatsApp integration
- Digital PR: Online reputation, crisis communication

## TECHNICAL_STACK
Frontend:
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite build system
- Tailwind CSS with RTL support
- Lucide React icons
- React Router for SPA navigation

Backend:
- Supabase (PostgreSQL database)
- Row Level Security (RLS)
- Real-time subscriptions
- Edge Functions for serverless logic

Hosting_and_CDN:
- Netlify hosting with custom domains
- Cloudinary for media management
- Global CDN for performance

Analytics_and_SEO:
- Google Analytics 4 (G-41Q3197J1M)
- Built-in SEO optimization
- Automatic sitemap generation
- Structured data markup
